ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN pf_riselog r ON r.person_id=m.id INNER JOIN mm_relation rl ON rl.member_id=m.id WHERE rl.reg_merchant_id={merchant_id} AND r.person_id={person_id} AND ({type}=-1 OR {type}=type) AND ('{keyword}' = '' OR (r.title LIKE '%{keyword}%'))
